hero.title: Discover Where Everyone Eats
hero.subtitle: Real experiences from real people. Follow foodies, discover hidden gems, and share your own finds. Earn rewards for every visit and climb the leaderboard.

features.title: Why Dinver?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to discover your next favorite restaurant

community.title: Community First
community.description: Follow friends, see where they've been, and discover restaurants through trusted recommendations.

experiences.title: Experience Feed
experiences.description: Scroll through authentic dining experiences like a social feed. Real photos, real reviews, real people.

rewards.title: Earn Rewards
rewards.description: Scan your receipt, log your visit, and compete on the leaderboard. Top explorers win prizes every two weeks.

lists.title: Must Visit & Visited
lists.description: Keep track of places you want to try and create a personal diary of everywhere you've been.

search.title: Search by Dish
search.description: Craving lasagna? Search for dishes and find which restaurants serve exactly what you want.

details.title: Complete Info
details.description: 360° virtual tours, interactive menus, working hours, photos, and everything you need to choose.

reservations.title: Easy Reservations
reservations.description: Book a table in seconds. Pick your date, time, and number of guests - all within the app.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From discovery to dining in three simple steps

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: Browse the Experience feed, search by dish or location, or check what's new at your favorite spots.

visit.title: Visit & Snap
visit.description: Dine at any restaurant and snap a photo of your receipt. We'll verify your visit and add it to your history.

share.title: Share & Earn
share.description: Create an Experience post with photos and ratings. Climb the leaderboard and unlock exclusive rewards.

experiences.title: Experience Feed
experiences.subtitle: Social network for food lovers
experiences.description: Scroll through authentic dining reviews like a social feed. Choose a city or search globally - discover restaurants through real photos and experiences from people. Like what you see? Click the restaurant and book a table!

whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.subtitle: Never miss a restaurant event
whatsNew.description: Restaurants post announcements like stories - live music tonight, new dish on menu, special offer. Filter by categories (Live Music, Happy Hour...) and discover what's happening nearby. Posts last 1-7 days.

visibility.title: Enhanced Visibility
visibility.description: Stand out with featured placement, virtual tours, and interactive menus.

analytics.title: Real Analytics
analytics.description: Track views, clicks, reservations, and understand your customers better.

updates.title: What's New Posts
updates.description: Share live music nights, new dishes, or special events directly with nearby food lovers.

community.title: Engaged Community
community.description: Connect with a community that loves discovering new dining experiences.

reservations.title: Built-in Reservations
reservations.description: Accept table reservations directly through the app. No extra tools needed.

map.title: Explore Partner Restaurants
map.subtitle: Discover verified dining experiences near you

contact.title: Become a Partner
contact.subtitle: Join our partner network and reach food lovers actively looking for their next great meal

form.success: Application received! We'll be in touch soon.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

restaurant.title: Are you a restaurant?
restaurant.description: Join our partner network and reach food lovers who are actively looking for their next great meal.

whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.subtitle: Fresh updates from your favorite restaurants

rewards.title: Climb the Leaderboard
rewards.subtitle: Earn points, compete with friends, and win real prizes
rewards.description: Every restaurant visit counts. Scan your receipt, earn points, and compete to be the top explorer. Top 3 winners every two weeks get a mystery box delivered to their door!

leaderboard.title: Current Leaderboard
leaderboard.blurText: Download app to see full leaderboard

mysteryBox.title: Mystery Box
mysteryBox.description: Top 3 explorers every 2 weeks win a mystery box with exclusive restaurant vouchers and Dinver merch!

partners.title: Grow Your Restaurant
partners.subtitle: Join 150+ partner restaurants reaching food lovers every day

visibility.title: Featured Placement
visibility.description: Get highlighted to users searching in your area

virtualTour.title: 360° Virtual Tour
virtualTour.description: Let guests explore your space before they visit

menu.title: Interactive Menu
menu.description: Showcase dishes with photos and descriptions

whatsNew.title: What's New Posts
whatsNew.description: Announce events, specials, and new dishes

analytics.title: Real Analytics
analytics.description: Understand your guests with detailed insights

badge.title: Partner Badge
badge.description: Stand out with the verified partner badge
